column4: Can explain how to copy ipw2200 firmware file into /lib/firmware Please.
you need root permissions to write to that folder
and you probably want to untar the archive before you copy it
This happened "tar: You may not specify more than one `-Acdtrux' option
This happened "tar: ipw2200-fw-2.3.tgz: Cannot open: No such file or directory
you need to specify the path
or be in the same directory
np, if i wasnt so tired i would try harder to help you :)
